issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://anicrush.to/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanicrush.to%2Fhome) ### Comment > browse to "https://anicrush.to/home" > this same problem is occuring at several sites. Theres been a few instances where some thunmbnails are displayed, but >70% not displayed . ### Screenshots
